name: Untitled Astronomer Game
description:
Untitled Astronomer Game is a short visual novel game where you influence astronomers of past to make different decisions and ultimately rewrite history!

> You are a space traveler who accidentally got teleported into the lives of famous astronomers, choose between Copernicus and Galileo!

> Snoop around and befriend them without causing suspicion or forever altering the course of history!

> If you fail, you cease to exist. Sorry, but we need to know about astronomy for space travel.

Created for HST320 by Anna, Spencer, Tarquin, and Emily.
